info.name: HiruuBackend - API
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for InDesk Healthcare Management API v1.0.0

This collection includes all available endpoints for:
- Authentication & User Management
- Clinic Management & Purchases
- Client & Appointment Management
- Assessment & Forms
- Invoicing & Subscriptions
- Analytics & Reporting
- Third-party Integrations
- Settings & Issue Tracking

Base URL: {{baseUrl}}
Authentication: Bearer Token (JWT)

Environment Variables Required:
- baseUrl: API base URL (e.g., http://localhost:3000)
- authToken: JWT access token for authenticated requests
